title: BookList
description: Schema definition for a BookNest book record

id.description: Application-specific identifier derived from the first six bytes of the book's UUID.

publication_year.description: The year the book was published. This may represent either the first edition or the specific edition owned.

series_name.description: The name of the series the book belongs to, if applicable.

location.description: The room or general area within the Nest where the book is located.

bookcase.description: The bookcase number where the book is stored. Defaults to 0 if the book is not assigned to a bookcase.

bookshelf.description: The shelf number within the bookcase. Defaults to 0 if the book is not assigned to a specific shelf.

isbn.description: The ISBN of the book, used primarily for ISBN-based lookup during book creation.

edition_note.description: Notes describing the bookâ€™s edition (e.g., special edition, printing details).

isPotentialDuplicate.description: Indicates whether the book may be a duplicate based on matching title and author last name.

imagePath.description: Path or URL to an image of the book, either user-provided or retrieved via ISBN lookup.

uuid.description: Universally unique identifier (UUID) assigned to the book.

createdDate.description: The date the book record was created in BookNest.

updatedDate.description: The most recent date the book record was updated in BookNest.

comments.description: A collection of user-added comments associated with the book.

name.description: The name of the user who added the comment.

commentDate.description: The date the comment was added.
